arts.ttl: David scores twice as Lille beats Auxerre 3-1 to pressure Lyon in race for Champions League
arts.sum: Canada striker Jonathan David scored two goals and set up the other as Lille beat Auxerre 3-1 on Sunday to maintain its push for a Champions League place next season. David ran through deep into injury time and held off defenders before grabbing his 16th league goal of what is likely to be his final season at Lille.

arts.ttl: Saint-Etienne vs Lyon Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch

arts.ttl: Easter Sunday's Ligue 1 predictions including Saint-Etienne vs. Lyon
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Ligue 1 fixtures, including Saint-Etienne vs. Lyon.

arts.ttl: Man United would be MAD to sell Kobbie Mainoo after his Lyon-taming act, writes DANNY MURPHY... Ruben Amorim must do all he can to keep him
arts.sum: DANNY MURPHY: Manchester United's incredible win against Lyon on Thursday night reminded us all it would be madness to let Kobbie Mainoo leave Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Slegers defiant despite Arsenal's first leg defeat to Lyon
arts.sum: Arsenal must come from behind in order to reach this season's Champions League showpiece in Lisbon after falling to a 2-1 first-leg semi-final defeat to Lyon.

arts.ttl: Arsenal 1-2 Lyon: Gunners sink to first leg defeat at the Emirates to leave them facing uphill task to reach Champions League final
arts.sum: TARA ANSON-WALSH AT THE EMIRATES STADIUM: The anticipation in north London was palpable before the game as over 40,000 fans travelled to the Emirates.
